body_html:
@asimshankar

$ python -c "import matplotlib; import numpy as np; print matplotlib.__version__; print np.__version__"
1.3.1
1.11.2

I did via

$ sudo virtualenv --system-site-packages ~/tensorflow
$ source ~/tensorflow/bin/activate

to update dependencies. So it seems they are not updating?

body:
@asimshankar 

```
$ python -c "import matplotlib; import numpy as np; print matplotlib.__version__; print np.__version__"
1.3.1
1.11.2
```

I did via

```
$ sudo virtualenv --system-site-packages ~/tensorflow
$ source ~/tensorflow/bin/activate
```

to update dependencies. So it seems they are not updating?
